short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close tabs with a right click: duplicates, tabs to the left or right, other tabs, tabs from the same URL, domain & more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right click and choose what to close:
- duplicate tabs
- tabs to the left or right
- from the same or different domain or URL as the current one
- from the current domain, but with a part of the URL path identical
